message: Let's be fair and split the money, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I want a bit more than half since the money loses value for me each round.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is the same offer you just rejected, only slightly better for you. Take the deal before inflation eats away at your potential gains!
I'll take a bigger share to compensate for the inflation, it's only fair.
Bob, this back and forth is pointless.  Let's split it evenly and end this.  You're losing more every round with this inflation.
